text: Tathārūpo ayaṃ bhikkhave bhikkhusaṅgho tathārūpā ayaṃ bhikkhave parisā yathārūpā parisā dullabhā dassanāya lokassa
edit: Tathārūpo ayaṃ bhikkhave bhikkhusaṅgho tathārūpā ayaṃ bhikkhave parisā yathārūpā parisā dullabhā dassanāya lokassa

translations.transtext: Monks, this group of monks as such; monks, this assembly as such is rare to be seen in the world.
